# Project Instructions

This is a Next.js 14 school management system for elementary schools with the following features:
- Teacher authentication system (NextAuth.js)
- Subject management
- Student grade input and management
- Excel export functionality
- PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
- Tailwind CSS styling with professional design

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- NextAuth.js for authentication
- Prisma ORM
- PostgreSQL (Neon database)
- ExcelJS for Excel export
- Vercel deployment ready

## Key Features
- Teacher login/register (one account per teacher)
- Subject management (add, edit, delete subjects)
- Student management (add students to subjects)
- Grade input system
- Excel export of grades
- Responsive design with sidebar navigation
- Professional blue/white theme
